extension.summary: Additional context menu items for TMDbHelper
extension.description: Adds additional TMDbHelper context menu items

Adds a global Kodi context menu entry for movies or shows that have a trailer on YouTube. Use from any add-on or widget. Configure settings for Select and/or Autoplay, Windowed or Fullscreen play.[CR]This is a fork of Venom's original add-on and may already be built into current Venom fork add-ons.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: Requires a working version of the YouTube Add-on

extension.description: [COLOR khaki]OpenWizard[/COLOR] offers many maintenance features, selective add-on data saving, and automated build installs. Perfect for keeping your Kodi running and distributing your own builds. You can also customize this add-on to make it your own.[CR]Many thanks to the developers drinfernoo and slamious for bringing us the Leia and Matrix versions of this add-on.
extension.news: 2.0.9 - Updated to include Kodi 21 Omega Builds 2.0.8 - Updated to include Kodi 20 Nexus Builds 2.0.7 - Fix Error when using default log settings 2.0.6 - Fix regex for formatting tags - Fix theme selection after build install - Fix downloading into invalid path 2.0.5 - Add Enable All Add-ons after Build Install 2.0.4 - Fix leftover broken dialogs 2.0.3 - Don't show previous version builds in Matrix 2.0.2 - Replace remaining occurences of LOGNOTICE 2.0.1 - Add attribution to @slamious 2.0.0 - Recoded for Kodi 19 Python 3

Questo addon consente di cambiare player scegliendo VLC, player personalizzato e player interno di Kodi tramite un semplice menù.

This add-on tests your Internet bandwith and reports both download and upload speeds and latency from within Kodi.
Use this if you are experiencing streaming issues and you suspect your network to be the cause.
extension.disclaimer: Speed Tester is powered by speedtest.net

v1.1.0 (2020-09-26) - Move add-on to Add-ons project - Fix typos and structure of standard output
v1.0.1 (2019-08-06) - Initial release

Musiktitel aus verschiedenen Quellen und Charts z.B. Beatport, Billboard, Officialcharts, Shazam etc. auswählen und das entsprechende Video automatisch auf YouTube suchen und über das YouTube-Addon abspielen.[CR][CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT

Select music titles from various sources and charts e.g. Beatport, Billboard, Officialcharts, Shazam etc. and automatically search for the corresponding video on YouTube and play it via the YouTube-Addon.[CR][CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT

extension.news: [B][COLOR orangered]Version 3.0.8+matrix.1 (22.06.2025)[/COLOR][/B] - fixed: 'OfficialCharts UK' sometimes the artist is not found and an error occurs - added: Category = AppleMusic with some lists to choose from - removed: Category = iTunes (Api switched off) - removed: Category = Spotify (The Public-Categories of the Api are no longer freely available) - optimized: Removed dependency and cache of webpages with 'script.common.plugin.cache' - comment: * Due to various changes to the 'settings', these are automatically reset when the Addon is started for the first time and the YouTube-API-KEY must be entered again ! *

extension.summary: Access your content from Easynews and Debrid Clouds.

extension.description: TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.

A simple little utility to backup your complete Kodi build into one zip file, quick and easy.[CR]You can change the default zip file storage to any local location you choose, accessible by your device like a downloads folder or thumb drive.[CR]It is recommended you restore to the same version of Kodi you backed up from to avoid potential version conflicts.
extension.disclaimer: Uses code from the SimpleWizard add-on

extension.description: Installing and uninstalling custom fonts for subtitles:[CR][CR]Arvo, Calibri, Futura Md BT, Gill Sans MT, GillSans, Helvetica, Helvetica Neue, IBM Plex Mono, IBM Plex Sans, IBM Plex Serif, Lato Medium, Lucida Grande, Montserrat, Noto Serif, Open Sans, Roboto, Source Sans Pro, Tahoma, Verdana
extension.disclaimer: Run the addon to install additional fonts. Running the addon again will uninstall the fonts.

extension.summary: Import YouTube channels into your Kodi TV Show or Music Video library.
extension.description: Add channels and playlists from YouTube to Library as TV-shows or Music Videos.[CR]1. You'll need a YouTube API key for this to work, a good guide would be:[CR]https://github.com/anxdpanic/plugin.video.youtube/wiki/Personal-API-Keys[CR]If you have set custom api key for YouTube addon you should be able to skip this part.[CR]2. Set Video Source (in Kodi -> Media -> Library -> Videos -> Add Videos)[CR]- FOR Video Channels: special://profile/library/series[CR]- FOR Music Videos: special://profile/library/music_videos[CR]- Setting for Information Provider choose: LOCAL
extension.news:
Changelog: v0.1.2 (2021.1.28) - Improvements in progress dialog when adding a playlist. - Removed hardcoded strings.
v0.1.1 (2021.1.28) - Bug fixes - Support for Tuber (Matrix only)
v0.1.0 Beta (2020.11.30) - Support for playlists. - Folder structure changed so channel ID is used instead of channel name. - Fixed search for Leia. - Split addon to multiple files instead of one blob.
v0.0.8 Beta (2020.6.9) - Support for music videos. (Thumbnails broken for v19) - EGG is now considered a valid unit of time. - Bug fixes.
v0.0.7 Beta (2020.6.6) - Multilanguage support added.
v0.0.6 Beta (2020.6.6) - One codebase to rule them all!
v0.0.5 Beta (2020.6.5) - Rewrote parser engine to handle big channels. - Some little fixes.
v0.0.4 Beta (2020.6.2) - Fixed new episodes not getting scanned.
v0.0.3 Alpha (2020/05/31) - Added management for channels.
v0.0.2 Alpha (2020/05/30) - Added background service.
v0.0.1 Alpha (2020/05/21) - Released Alpha.

extension.description: This module is a fork of CoCoScrapers with new scrapers from Kodifitzwell installed[CR]Credits to the develpers involved from former Fenom and CoCoScraper coders to current coders of CocoScrapers and of course, Kodifitzwell.[CR]Compatible with Fen, Fen Light, Umbrella and any other add-ons currently using the CoCoScrapers option.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: This module simply scans for internet sources that matches common metadata.
extension.news: - Added a Providers Results Test - Removed dead scrapers

addon.name: Live TV Playlist

extension.summary: Gerente de Lista de Reproducción de TV en Vivo
extension.description: The Live TV PlayList Manager provides a service for clients to use to schedule live TV events. A Live TV Playlist is a list of channel change instructions that occur at a specified time. A Playlist item consists of an alarm time, channel and recurrence option. The manager maintains a database of playlist items and saves the list in a file. This file is read each time the IPTV manager starts up so that on going events will always occur.

Gerente de Lista de Reproducción de TV en Vivo ofrece un servicio para que los clientes utilicen para programar eventos de TV en vivo. Una lista de reproducción de TV en vivo es una lista de instrucciones de cambio de canal que ocurren en un momento específico. Un elemento de lista de reproducción consiste en una hora de alarma, un canal y una opción de repetición. El administrador mantiene una base de datos de elementos de la lista de reproducción y guarda la lista en un archivo. Este archivo se lee cada vez que se inicia el administrador para que los eventos en curso siempre ocurran.

Der Manager für TV-Wiedergabelisten stellt einen Service für Clients zur Verfügung, um Fernsehsendungen zu planen. Eine Wiedergabeliste für TV-Programme ist eine Liste von Kanalwechselbefehlen, die zu einer bestimmten Zeit stattfinden. Ein Element der Wiedergabeliste besteht aus einer Alarmzeit, einem Kanal und einer Wiederholungsoption. Der Manager verwaltet eine Datenbank mit Wiedergabelistenelementen und speichert die Liste in einer Datei. Diese Datei wird bei jedem Start des Managers gelesen, so dass laufende Ereignisse ständig ausgeführt werden.
extension.disclaimer: Use with context menu on your TV Guide.
extension.license: GNU General Public License v3.0 only, June 2007

addon.news:
2.0.6 April 19, 2025 - Fixed bug in Countdown module->miniClient class->killThread method 2.0.5 February 12, 2024 - Fixed/upgraded suspend/eneable item functionality Fixed next date calculation in PLX_Event 2.0.4 January 3, 2024 - Fix priorityqueue issue in Alarms Manager 2.0.2 August 4, 2021 - Fixed zombie event caused by bug in Alarm _findTimer() - Sorted log alarm queue display
2.0.1 July 19, 2021 - Fixed updting based on EPG changes

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news:
2.0.10: 6 June 2021 - Fixed bug that prevented Hebrew language for working
2.0.9: 15 May 2021 - Fixed bug in Player.def activateWindowCommand(cmd) that was messing up the ability to return from child direrctories
2.0.8: 14 May 2021 - Fixed various incompatibilities with latest version of Matrix involving decode('utf-8') that caused crashes.
2.0.7: 17 February 2021 - Fixed remote folder access via another plugin
2.0.6: 11 January 2021 - Fixed access to local folders and smb folders
2.0.5: 12 December 2020 - More Fixes for Network Folder Failure to Launch
2.0.0: 29 November 2020 - Matrix Version
